preprocessor package¶

preprocessor.preprocessing module¶

preprocessor.preprocessing.import_dataset(url)¶

Import the dataset from a path (locally on the computer). The file extension must be .csv or .data

Parameters

url (string) – the path where to find the dataset.

Returns

(DataFrame) - the dataset contained in the URL. Pandas DataFrame object.

Raises

Exception – the extension of the file isn’t supported

Warning

The files from which we want to extract datasets must be .csv or .data

preprocessor.preprocessing.min_max_scaling(dataset)¶

Scale the dataset with a min-max Sklearn scaler (MinMaxScaler object)

Parameters

dataset (DataFrame) – the dataset to scale

Returns

(DataFrame) - the scaled dataset

preprocessor.preprocessing.normalize(dataset)¶

Normalize the dataset with sklearn normalizer (Normalizer object)

Parameters

dataset (DataFrame) – the dataset to normalize

Returns

(DataFrame) - the normalized dataset

preprocessor.preprocessing.polynomial_scaling(dataset)¶

Scale the dataset with a polynomial Sklearn scaler (PolynomialFeatures object)

Parameters

dataset (DataFrame) – the dataset to scale

Returns

(DataFrame) - the scaled dataset

preprocessor.preprocessing.preprocessing(dataset, n_split, n_norm)¶

Preprocess the given dataset.

Parameters

  • dataset (DataFrame) – the dataset to preprocess

  • n_split (int) –

    determine the split technique.

    n_split = 1 : random_state = 30

    n_split = 2 : random_state = 20

    n_split = 3 : random_state = 10

  • n_norm (int) –

    determine the normalization technique.

    n_norm = 1 : Standard scaling

    n_norm = 2 : MinMax scaling

    n_norm = 3 : Polynomial scaling

    n_norm = 4 : Normalizer

Returns

(array-like) - four array-like that correspond to train values and labels and test values and labels. These array-like can be directly used in model modules.

Raises

Exception – the entry for splitting or scaling isn’t known

preprocessor.preprocessing.standard_scaling(dataset)¶

Scale the dataset with a standard Sklearn scaler (StandardScaler object)

Parameters

dataset (DataFrame) – the dataset to scale

Returns

(DataFrame) - the scaled dataset

Full use example¶

1from preprocessor import preprocessing as pp
2
3dataset = pp.import_dataset("Data/winequality-red.csv")
4
5x_train, x_test, y_train, y_test = pp.preprocessing(dataset, n_split, n_normalization)
